name: CPP Medical review
pattern:
{paxlovid_contraindication}COVID Positive Pathways Medical review

{doctor}

COVID specific history
Symptoms start date - {date_symptoms}
Test performed - {test_type} {date_test}
Vaccination status - {vax}

Past medical history
{Pmhx}

Medications
{meds_pharmacist}{meds_general,meds_prescribed, meds_over_the_counter, meds_sleep, meds_inject, meds_vitamin, meds_herbal, meds_chinese, meds_skin, meds_orifice, meds_resp, meds_treatment, meds_trial}

Allergies
{allergies_pharmacist}{allergies_general,meds_allergies}

COVID Symptoms
Reported vital signs at time of call: {vital}
HR: {hr}
SpO2: {oxygen}
Temperature: {temp}{reports_fever}{fever|yes,rigors|yes,night_sweats|yes,fullstop}{denies_fever}{fever|no,rigors|no,night_sweats|no,fullstop}
How are they generally feeling? {feeling}
Any episodes of syncope / feeling light-headed / postural dizziness? {syncope_concerns}{syncope_reports}{syncope|yes,lightheadedness|yes,postural_dizziness|yes,fullstop}{syncope_denies}{syncope|no,lightheadedness|no,postural_dizziness|no,fullstop} {syncope_other}
CNS Assessment: {orientated}{cns_concerns}{cns_reports}{headache|yes,weakness|yes,lethargy|yes,myalgia|yes,fullstop}{cns_denies}{headache|no,weakness|no,lethargy|no,myalgia|no,fullstop} {cns_other}
CVS Assessment: {cvs_concerns}{cvs_reports}{chest_pain|yes,palpitations|yes,calf|yes,oedema|yes,fullstop}{cvs_denies}{chest_pain|no,palpitations|no,calf|no,oedema|no,fullstop} {cvs_other}
RESP Assessment: {RESP_concerns}{RESP_reports}{SOB|yes,SOBOE|yes,wheeze|yes,cough_type,haemoptysis|yes,throat|yes,congestion|yes,rhinorrhoea|yes,fullstop}{RESP_denies}{SOB|no,SOBOE|no,wheeze|no,cough|no,haemoptysis|no,throat|no,congestion|no,rhinorrhoea|no,fullstop} {RESP_other}
GIT Assessment: {GIT_concerns}{GIT_reports}{nausea|yes,vomiting|yes,diarrhoea|yes,appetite|yes,taste|yes,weight|yes,abdo|yes,fullstop}{GIT_denies}{nausea|no,vomiting|no,diarrhoea|no,appetite|no,taste|no,weight|no,abdo|no,fullstop} {GIT_other}
RENAL Assessment: {RENAL_concerns}{RENAL_reports}{fluid,urine_output,urine_colour,dysuria|yes,fullstop}{RENAL_denies}{dysuria|no,fullstop} {RENAL_other}
Psychosocial / Mobility Assessment: {household}. {support}{molnupiravir_consent}{molnupiravir_consent_1,molnupiravir_consent_2,molnupiravir_consent_3,molnupiravir_consent_4,molnupiravir_consent_5,molnupiravir_consent_6,molnupiravir_consent_7,down_list}

Impression{covid_severity,immunosuppressed,early|no,early_med,trajectory,down_list}

Plan{plan_general,down_list}{advice}{child_bearing_advice,breastfeeding_advice,down_list}{medication_review_text}{CKD_text}{CKD}{liver_text}{liver}{hypersensitivity_text}{hypersensitivity}{pregnant_text}{pregnant}{breastfeeding_text}{breastfeeding}{child_bearing_text}{child_bearing}{meds_adequate_text}{meds_adequate}{meds_support_text}{meds_support}{meds_knowledge_text}{meds_knowledge}{meds_helper_text}{meds_helper}{meds_pharmacy_text}{meds_pharmacy}{meds_difficulty_text}{meds_difficulty}{meds_webster_text}{meds_webster}{meds_drugs_text}{meds_drugs}{meds_allergies_text}{meds_allergies}{meds_prescribed_text}{meds_prescribed}{meds_not_prescribed_text}{meds_not_prescribed_yesno|No}{meds_not_prescribed}{meds_over_the_counter_text}{meds_over_the_counter}{meds_over_the_counter_yesno|No}{meds_sleep_text}{meds_sleep}{meds_sleep_yesno|No}{meds_inject_text}{meds_inject}{meds_inject_yesno|No}{meds_vitamin_text}{meds_vitamin}{meds_vitamin_yesno|No}{meds_herbal_text}{meds_herbal}{meds_herbal_yesno|No}{meds_chinese_text}{meds_chinese}{meds_chinese_yesno|No}{meds_skin_text}{meds_skin}{meds_skin_yesno|No}{meds_orifice_text}{meds_orifice}{meds_orifice_yesno|No}{meds_resp_text}{meds_resp}{meds_resp_yesno|No}{meds_treatment_text}{meds_treatment}{meds_treatment_yesno|No}{meds_trial_text}{meds_trial}{meds_trial_yesno|No}{meds_stop_text}{meds_stop}{meds_stop_yesno|No}

variables.default: Does the patient have CKD with eGFR <30? Or on renal replacement therapy?

or.equals: Paxlovid - medication review performed by doctor
Paxlovid - medication review performed by pharmacist

variables.display: Does the patient have CKD with eGFR <30? Or on renal replacement therapy?

or.equals: Paxlovid - medication review performed by doctor
Paxlovid - medication review performed by pharmacist

variables.text: Ask patient if they have had a renal function test in the last 3 months, and if so where this was done (follow up results). Ask if patient has ever been told they have kidney problems. Assess risk of possible renal dysfunction (e.g. age, comorbidities, medications, systemic symptoms from COVID). If the info on CKD is not adequate or there is clinical reason to believe patient may have impaired renal function, consider offering sotrovimab or doing renal function test. If patient has had renal function test within 3 months or there is no clinical reason to believe the patient may have impaired renal function, then the patient can be considered for paxlovid. If eGFR is 30-60 within last 3 months and this is the patients baseline, base paxlovid dosing on this. If there is reason that this may have changed, consider offering sotrovimab or doing renal function test.

name: COVID HITH Medical Review
pattern:
{doctor}

{template}{drug}

Impression{covid_severity,immunosuppressed|yes,early|no,early_med,trajectory,down_list}

Time of call: {time}
3 Point ID Check Performed: {id_check}
Was video telehealth used? If not,why was it NOT used? {telehealth}{telehealth_no}
Date of onset of illness: {symptom}
Date Positive Swab Collected: {test} {test_date}
Vaccination status: {vax}
If we are unable to contact you whilst under the HITH program and concerned about your welfare, who would you like us to contact? {nok}
Past medical history: {pmhx}
Current Medications: {meds}
Allergies: {allergies}
Reported vital signs at time of call: {vital}
HR: {hr}
SpO2: {oxygen}
Temperature: {temp}{reports_fever}{fever|yes,rigors|yes,night_sweats|yes,fullstop}{denies_fever}{fever|no,rigors|no,night_sweats|no,fullstop}

variables.default: Paxlovid specific advice provided to patient
Paxlovid assessement performed and not suitable for patient
Does the patient have CKD with eGFR <30? Or on renal replacement therapy?

variables.display: Does the patient have CKD with eGFR <30? Or on renal replacement therapy?

variables.text: Ask patient if they have had a renal function test in the last 3 months, and if so where this was done (follow up results). Ask if patient has ever been told they have kidney problems. Assess risk of possible renal dysfunction (e.g. age, comorbidities, medications, systemic symptoms from COVID). If the info on CKD is not adequate or there is clinical reason to believe patient may have impaired renal function, consider offering sotrovimab or doing renal function test. If patient has had renal function test within 3 months or there is no clinical reason to believe the patient may have impaired renal function, then the patient can be considered for paxlovid. If eGFR is 30-60 within last 3 months and this is the patients baseline, base paxlovid dosing on this. If there is reason that this may have changed, consider offering sotrovimab or doing renal function test.
